General.Name: Iskandar Waterfront City Bhd
General.Description: Iskandar Waterfront City Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development, property land-banking, and construction activities in Malaysia. The company develops residential and commercial properties. It also constructs infrastructure projects and buildings. The company was formerly known as Tebrau Teguh Berhad and changed its name to Iskandar Waterfront City Berhad in July 2014. Iskandar Waterfront City Berhad was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
